body:
If we were to go with the `ColumnTyper` approach: for safety, I (manually) verified that there is no exported `ColumnTypes` field or method on the struct implementing `driver.Rows` in any of the known driver packages, so this should be a non-breaking change.

List of drivers is from golang [wiki](https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/SQLDrivers). Each link is to the source for the struct that implements `driver.Rows`:


- [x] [Apache Phoenix/Avatica](https://github.com/Boostport/avatica/blob/master/rows.go#L11)
- [x] [Couchbase N1QL](https://github.com/couchbase/go_n1ql/blob/master/rows.go#L21)
- [x] [DB2](https://bitbucket.org/phiggins/db2cli/src/347a77fd71abb55325ebea9ca6c2a71c614e9a21/rows.go?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#rows.go-13)
- [x] [Firebird SQL](https://github.com/nakagami/firebirdsql/blob/master/rows.go#L33)
- [x] [MS ADODB](https://github.com/mattn/go-adodb/blob/master/adodb.go#L215)
- [x] [MS SQL Server - denisenkom (pure go)](https://github.com/denisenkom/go-mssqldb/blob/fbf0a491e5ec011522c8870da9b0553135e2f9da/mssql.go#L326)
- [x] [MS SQL Server - minus5 (uses cgo)](https://github.com/minus5/gofreetds/blob/33e02c9f9fe0c467495bd2a16703eb57ac09114f/mssql_stmt.go#L41)
- [x] [MySQL - ziutek](https://github.com/ziutek/mymysql/blob/df6241f6355c5595d99e9661039f8648c440deba/godrv/driver.go#L23)
- [x] [MySQL - go-sql-driver](https://github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql/blob/master/rows.go#L24)
- [x] [ODBC - miquella](https://bitbucket.org/miquella/mgodbc/src/2207dbb576082c34dacb4e887357ecfa99e011d5/mgodbc.go?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#mgodbc.go-754)

- [x] [SQLite - mattn](https://github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3/blob/e5a3c16c5c1d80b24f633e68aecd6b0702786d3d/sqlite3.go#L187)
